alert.note: Alert for Gage; Jefferson; Johnson; Lancaster; Pawnee; Saline (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 10:13PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL LANCASTER...WESTERN JOHNSON...NORTHEASTERN JEFFERSON...SOUTHEASTERN SALINE...NORTHWESTERN PAWNEE AND GAGE COUNTIES THROUGH 1045 PM CDT... At 1013 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles southwest of Adams to 3 miles east of Pickrell to 4 miles northwest of Beatrice to 3 miles north of Harbine. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Beatrice, Wymore, Firth, Adams, De Witt, Cortland, Sterling, Plymouth, Blue Springs, Clatonia, Hallam, Pickrell, Filley, Lewiston, Virginia, Harbine, Crab Orchard, Holmesville, Cub Creek Recreational Area, and Homestead National Historical Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gage; Jefferson; Johnson; Lancaster; Pawnee; Saline
